spatial_accuracy.notes: Door to bedroom is incorrectly represented as a solid wall with an adjacent door; the stairwell entrance is missing; the main entrance orientation is flipped; several windows on the southern wall and eastern wall are missing.

structural_fidelity.notes: The stairwell room is fundamentally reinterpreted as a closet/small bathroom extension; the entry sequence is altered. Background and cutaway requirements are satisfied.

furniture_mapping.notes: Kitchen, bed, and dining set are mostly accurate in placement, though a TV unit was hallucinated in the living area where there was empty space.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent adherence to low-poly, flat-shaded styling. Soft ambient lighting and isometric orthographic camera angle are perfect.

detected_errors.description: Missing staircase room and multiple windows on the perimeter walls.
Bedroom door and hallway access shifted significantly from floor plan layout.
Hallucinated TV stand in the living room and an extra interior wall partition.
